name: Blobs at Work
description:
Join blobs together in Blobs at work, a fast paced puzzle game where you play as the guide, trying to gather as many blobs as you possibly can, while avoiding the different types of enemies who want to disrupt your plans!

------------------

This is my first game jam ever, and the idea was inspired by the way our body cells and immune system defend against infections.  As the development progressed, we realized that our core mechanics didn't have much to do with the way our systems actually behave, so we decided to change from actual cells into blobs. The game's art was made from scratch by my girlfriend, while I was responsible for coding. Music came from free sources (nosoapradio and freesound.org)

Hope you enjoy, and go join all those blobs!
